headline: The Score: Delta, AMD, Tesla and More Stocks That Defined the Week
summary: Sunny quarterly results from  Delta Air Lines  sent air carrier stocks soaring on Thursday.  Delta said it expects travel demand to continue to bounce back and is aiming for a record holiday season.  Delta shares rose 4.3% Thursday.

raw.headline: The Score: Delta, AMD, Tesla and More Stocks That Defined the Week
raw.summary: Sunny quarterly results from  Delta Air Lines  sent air carrier stocks soaring on Thursday.  Delta said it expects travel demand to continue to bounce back and is aiming for a record holiday season.  Delta shares rose 4.3% Thursday.

headline: Monumental Step for Conservation: Michigan Audubon Scales Sustainable Bird City Initiative State-Wide with Ford Motor Company
summary: On World Migratory Bird Day, Michigan Audubon and Ford Motor Company announce a landmark partnership. This significant collaboration, with Ford as the Founding Sponsor of the Bird City Michigan initiative, is set to accelerate bird conservation and habitat restoration across the state. The partnership, a testament to the shared commitment to environmental stewardship, will provide crucial funding and support Michigan Audubon's efforts to rapidly expand the program's reach into cities, townships,

headline: Ford names new head of Europe unit and makes a key change to U.S. operations
summary: Ford said Jim Baumbick, VP of Advanced Product Development, Cycling Planning and Programs, will become president of Ford Europe on Nov. 1.

raw.headline: Ford names new head of Europe unit and makes a key change to U.S. operations
raw.summary: Ford said Jim Baumbick, VP of Advanced Product Development, Cycling Planning and Programs, will become president of Ford Europe on Nov. 1.

headline: Ford Could Lose Up to $1 Billion as Plant Fire Hobbles F-150 Production
summary: The product fallout for Ford's most profitable vehicle could be immense.

headline: AI enabled Klarna to halve its workforce—now, the CEO is warning workers that other ‘tech bros’ are sugarcoating just how badly it’s about to impact jobs
summary: Sebastian Siemiatkowski, who told Sam Altman he wanted Klarna to be ChatGPT’s “favorite guinea pig,” says too many CEOs are downplaying how disruptive AI will really be.

headline: Staying power: Ford’s F-150 hybrid system remains a winner
summary: Driving proves the F-150 hybrid lives up to the hype. Our Lariat tester returned more than 22 mpg in our longer mixed-driving runabouts.

raw.headline: Staying power: Ford’s F-150 hybrid system remains a winner
raw.summary: Driving proves the F-150 hybrid lives up to the hype. Our Lariat tester returned more than 22 mpg in our longer mixed-driving runabouts.

headline: Trump’s crackdown on EVs hits home in the Battery Belt
summary: STANTON, Tenn (Reuters) -Stanton, Tennessee - population 450 - welcomed a massive new neighbor a few years ago: a Ford electric-truck and joint venture battery plant slated to employ 6,000 workers.  Ford’s 2022 groundbreaking triggered an influx of construction activity into the former cotton-and-soybean farmlands outside of Memphis.  Stanton is quieter these days.
